contents.text: Welcome to Vevo, the world's leading all-premium music video and entertainment platform.
For advertiser solutions and campaign support, press 1.
To learn about our advertising products and reach 25 billion viewers monthly, press 1.
Please stay on the line. An advertising specialist will be with you shortly. Enjoy the latest music videos while you wait.

navigationGoals: I need pricing and package details to launch a quick ad campaign.
I’d like to explore advertising packages on Vevo for my veteran-owned small business.
I want to review Vevo’s ad product specifications and programmatic targeting options.
I’d like to set up a new Vevo ad campaign and need guidance on my advertising options.
Inquire about ad packages to promote a university physics club event

contents.text: For assistance with campaign analytics and performance reporting, press 2.
Your call is important to us. A campaign analyst will join your call soon. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: I want to access in-depth performance analytics for my current campaign.
I need help reviewing the analytics and performance metrics of my current Vevo ad campaign.
I need to retrieve detailed analytics and performance reports for my active ad campaign.
I need help reviewing my campaign analytics and understanding my performance report.
Request performance metrics for a recent physics seminar advertisement

contents.text: For artist and label inquiries, press 2.
To submit music videos or discuss content partnerships, press 1.
Please hold for our content partnerships team. We appreciate your interest in teaming up with Vevo.

navigationGoals: I need to submit my artist’s new music video and discuss a partnership.
I want to submit a music video I produced for consideration by Vevo’s content partnerships team.
I’d like to submit my new music video and discuss integrating via Vevo’s content ingestion API.
I want to submit my music video and discuss a content partnership opportunity.
Submit physics-themed videos for potential feature on Vevo

contents.text: For royalty payments and revenue questions, press 2.
One moment please. Our revenue support team will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need clarification on my label’s recent royalty payments.
I have questions about the royalty payouts and revenue generated from my videos on Vevo.
I need an itemized royalty statement and to verify my revenue payout schedule.
I have questions about my royalty payments and need help checking their status.
Clarify royalty payments for my science outreach content
